headline: Becton, Dickinson and Company (BDX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Becton, Dickinson and Company on X.com by @MoneyShow. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BDX. Becton, Dickinson and Company’s share was trading at $176.66 as of February 26th. BDX’s trailing and forward P/E were 35.03 and 12.82, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Becton, Dickinson and Company (BDX) […]
